location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babingten [Babington], Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babingten [Babington], Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, enclosing a letter sent on 31 December 1813 from J. Adam, Secretary to the Government at Fort William, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay, regarding the recovery of the disbursements of the Residency.
